commentary.text: Finch and Dhawan will open for Sunrisers
Sandeep Sharma to Finch,no run,swinging in late and full to off, driven to mid on
Sandeep Sharma to Finch,no run,tries to drive a length ball on the off side but ends up hitting it to the bowler
Sandeep Sharma to Finch, $$SIX$$ ,fuller this time, and Finch steps forward and lifts it straight with a smooth followthrough
Sandeep Sharma to Finch,2 runs,overpitched on the pad now, and is flicked in the air in front of square
Sandeep Sharma to Finch,1 run,driven wide of extra cover for a single
Sandeep Sharma to Dhawan,1 wide,swinging in but starts outside leg and carries further down
Sandeep Sharma to Dhawan,1 run,drives on the up, on the bounce to mid off, who throws and misses at the non-striker's and they get one for the overthrow
Mitchell Johnson

sreejith: "Would have been better if Warner opened along with Finch. They look in excellent rhythm when they are together. Dhawan's poor form may hamper the initial momentum. I would be happy if he proves me wrong."
Johnson to Dhawan,no run,short, wide and bouncing outside off, Dhawan has a go and misses
Johnson to Dhawan, $$OUT$$ ,Johnson strikes early, length ball seaming away outside off, Dhawan stands and wafts, and feathers it behind
Two slips
Johnson to Warner,no run,digs in a bouncer first up to Warner, who tries to hook, in vain
Johnson to Warner,1 run,full around off, Warner is a touch late in getting forward and drives it through cover
Johnson to Finch,no run,stays on the crease and plays out a sharp length ball to point
Johnson to Finch, $$FOUR$$ ,shot, this was fuller, going across, providing him some room to lean forward and stroke it between extra cover and mid off
Sandeep Sharma to Warner,no run,full at 125.6 kph on middle, eased to extra cover
Sandeep Sharma to Warner,no run,flashes at a pitched up ball just outside off, inside edges it to the keeper, who does well to dive to his right to stop it
Sandeep Sharma to Warner,no run,wanted to turn this length ball to leg, but played it straight in the end
Sandeep Sharma to Warner,2 runs,fuller on the pad, and worked in front of square
Sandeep Sharma to Warner,no run,Warner not able to get this line and length away at the moment, pitched up around middle and leg, and he squeezes it to point
Sandeep Sharma to Warner, $$FOUR$$ ,this will help him, down the pads this time and Warner sends it wide of short fine leg
Johnson to Finch,no run,147 kph short of a length delivery, Finch takes it high on the thigh pad as he fails to nudge it square
Johnson to Finch,1 no ball,right on middle stump, on a good length, played to midwicket, and Johnson has overstepped to give a free hit
Johnson to Finch,1 run,it is short from Johnson, Finch goes deep in the crease and pulls hard, but straight to Miller at square leg

Johnson to Warner,1 no ball,terrific stop from Miller at cover, Warner made some room and slapped this length ball, it was racing away before Miller dived to his left to cut it off... and Johnson has bowled another no ball
Johnson to Warner,1 run,and he gets away with another free hit, a slow back of a length ball down the leg side, it pings Warner on the glove as he tries to adjust his pull
Johnson to Finch, $$FOUR$$ ,gets some width and slaps the length delivery in the air and wide of extra cover
Johnson to Finch,1 run,slow and full outside off, guided to third man
Johnson to Warner,no run,chops a length ball to cover
Balaji to Finch,no run,holds the line from just back of a length outside off, Finch dabs at it and is beaten
Balaji to Finch,no run,angled in to middle from wide of the crease, played back

Balaji to Finch, $$OUT$$ ,gone through him, Balaji angles it in again, pitched up, not really the length to be playing back to, but Finch prefers that, this time he is caught in an awkward position as this rushes in and goes through to hit the stumps
Balaji to Rahul,1 wide,starts way outside off and moves further away
Balaji to Rahul,1 run,angled into middle and off, Rahul moves across to work it to midwicket
Balaji to Warner, $$OUT$$ ,Balaji is smiling again, this has kicked at Warner from just back of a length, the surprised batsman jabs at it and it pops tamely to point
Balaji to Venugopal Rao,no run,moves forward and drives a pitched up ball to mid off
Keeper standing up to Rishi Dhawan
Dhawan to Rahul,2 runs,drags a pull wide of mid on
Dhawan to Rahul,1 run,chops this from close to the body down to third man
Dhawan to Venugopal Rao,no run,that climbed outside off, Rao tried to play at it, but was beaten
Dhawan to Venugopal Rao, $$FOUR$$ ,succeeds this time, another one gets up, not as much as the previous one, Rao is ready and cuts it high over point
Dhawan to Venugopal Rao, $$FOUR$$ ,over midwicket now, attacks a length delivery from outside off and crashes it one bounce over the rope
Dhawan to Venugopal Rao,1 run,slower one outside off, dabbed to short third man
Sandeep Sharma to Venugopal Rao,1 run,slower one full outside off to begin the over, eased to extra cover, direct hit would have had him just short
Sandeep Sharma to Rahul,1 run,length ball on middle, knocked down to long on
Sandeep Sharma to Venugopal Rao,no run,bounces from back of a length, is run to point
Sandeep Sharma to Venugopal Rao,1 run,another slower ball on off and middle, turned to square leg
Sandeep Sharma to Rahul,1 run,good length ball driven to deep point

Sandeep Sharma to Venugopal Rao, $$OUT$$ ,Sandeep has been accurate all along, he keeps it on a good length, around off, Rao tries to force it square on the leg side, misses and Sandeep hits off with slight away movement
Patel to Rahul,1 run,steps out and pushes to sweeper cover for a single
Adib: "This is where SRH will be a significant disadvantage, no stability in the middle order. With Warner, Finch and Dhawan all misfiring it's going to be a struggle winning important matches."
Patel to Pathan,no run,shout for leg before but that pitched outside leg
Patel to Pathan,1 run,drives one slanted across him to long off
Patel to Rahul,no run,defended off the front foot
Patel to Rahul,2 leg byes,tries to paddle it from outside off, it rolls fine on the off side instead
Patel to Rahul,1 run,drives a full one hard but there is sweeper cover
Dhawan to Rahul,1 run,worked off the pad to deep backward square
Dhawan to Pathan,1 run,length ball punched to wide long on
Dhawan to Rahul, $$FOUR$$ ,111.7 kph slower one outside off, Rahul moves outside leg and smashes it past extra cover's dive
Dhawan to Rahul,1 run,length on middle and leg, he goes back to work it to deep square
Dhawan to Pathan,1 wide,105 kph slower one starts outside leg and goes down straight
Dhawan to Pathan,1 run,overpitched delivery driven to long off
Dhawan to Rahul,1 run,overpitched again, driven to sweeper cover
Maxwell to Rahul,1 run,short and wide from round the stumps, cut to the sweeper
Maxwell to Pathan,no run,beats him on the push with some spin and bounce outside off
Maxwell to Pathan,1 run,worked in the air through vacant square leg off the pads
Maxwell to Rahul,1 run,flat and quick in to the pad at 95.8 kph, turned square
Maxwell to Pathan,1 run
Maxwell to Rahul, $$SIX$$ ,overpitched and Rahul slog-sweeps it just over the man at long on
Patel to Pathan,no run,in the blockhole, squeezed back
Patel to Pathan, $$OUT$$ ,gone on the slog sweep, 100-plus kph from the left-armer, full around leg, Irfan gets down for the slog sweep, misses and is bowled
Patel to Sammy,no run,pushes back a full one to the bowler
Patel to Sammy,3 runs,opens the face and squeezes a wide one past backward point's dive
Patel to Rahul,1 run,nudges a length ball to the leg side and takes off, bowler rushes after it, direct hit would have been tight
Patel to Sammy,1 run,goes back to hit it to the sweeper
Balaji to Sammy,no run,mistimes a push to mid off, non-striker rushes for the single, Sammy takes a few steps and stops, Rahul makes it back in time
Balaji to Sammy,2 runs,width from back of a length, slapped over extra cover for a couple
Balaji to Sammy,1 run,no width this time, he punches a shortish one to long on
Balaji to Rahul,1 run,short and wide but slow at 114 kph, he underedges it towards the keeper
Balaji to Sammy,1 run,cannot get under this one angled in and knocks it to midwicket instead
Balaji to Rahul,no run,back of a length, punched to the bowler
Patel to Sammy,no run,wanted to attack this but in the end just pushed it back
Patel to Sammy, $$SIX$$ ,he will get under this one just outside off and lift it cleanly onto the roof of the stadium way past the long on boundary
Patel to Sammy,1 run,shorter and quicker, he goes back and pulls it down to long on
Patel to Rahul,no run,that was plumb had he not inside edged it first, he was pretty deep in the crease looking to work it to leg
Patel to Rahul,no run
Patel to Rahul,1 run,worked through midiwicket for a single
Balaji to Rahul,no run,shortish ball rising rapidly, he tries to pull this from wide outside off but misses
Balaji to Rahul,1 run,moves across outside off to turn it to midwicket

Balaji to Sammy, $$OUT$$ ,Sammy's tried to fetch this short of a length ball from way outside off and flat-bat it down the ground but he has not got enough elevation on the mishit, mid off times his jump to take a sharp catch
Balaji to Sharma,1 run,pushes a good length ball wide of cover
Balaji to Rahul,no run,very full delivery squeezed straight to backward point
Balaji to Rahul,1 leg bye,moves across and tries to go leg side from wide outside off, is hit on the pad
Patel to Rahul, $$OUT$$ ,this has gone miles in the air, Rahul steps out, is not to the pitch of one that straightens, but goes through with the shot, Miller at long off settles under it
Patel to Sharma,1 run,turned to fine leg off the pad
Patel to Steyn,1 run,angled in, nudged to midwicket for a single
Patel to Sharma,1 run
Patel to Steyn,no run,inside edges a tossed up full ball onto the pad and into the off side
Patel to Steyn,1 run,comes down the track and squirts this in the air to the sweeper
Johnson to Steyn,no run,drives a pitched up ball down the pitch, Johnson gets a hand to it
Johnson to Steyn,no run,snorter from fast bowler to fast bowler, Steyn prods and misses as this back of a length ball bounces and flies past the edge outside off
Johnson to Steyn,2 runs,another skier as Steyn swings and edges, falls in between two men, Maxwell stands and watches as third man comes in and tries to go for it, but it is too late by then
Johnson to Steyn,1 run,thick outside edge goes flying past slip this time
Johnson to Sharma,no run,around the blockhole, eased to the bowler
Johnson to Sharma, $$SIX$$ ,Sharma's made some room outside leg, Johnson's bouncer has followed him, but he's somehow managed to hook it over deep square leg
Time out
Sandeep Sharma to Steyn,1 run,full and across him from round the stumps, driven to cover
Sandeep Sharma to Sharma,1 run,hits a length ball in the air and it falls at vacant mid off
Sandeep Sharma to Steyn,no run,slower one outside off, Steyn has a go at edges it along the ground to the keeper
Sandeep Sharma to Steyn,no run,slanted across from back of a length, Steyn cannot connect
Sandeep Sharma to Steyn,2 runs,very full just outside off, forced through midwicket
Sandeep Sharma to Steyn,1 run,in the blockhole on the stumps, he fails to turn it to leg and it rolls onto the crease
Johnson to Steyn,1 run,another  $$drop$$ , Steyn skies a back of a length ball, keeper's catch as it comes down just behind square on leg close to the stumps, but Saha clangs it
Johnson to Sharma,no run,beaten by a pitched up delivery outside off
Johnson to Sharma, $$OUT$$ ,this time a catch sticks, Sharma backs away, Johnson angles it in full and Sharma lifts it tamely to mid off
Johnson to Mishra,no run,that almost took off stump, as Mishra pushed inside the line of this pitched up delivery
Johnson to Mishra,1 run,low and wide full toss squeezed to third man's right
Johnson to Steyn,1 run,reaches for a full and wide one outside off, it goes in front of square on leg
Balaji to Steyn,1 run,pushes a length ball to mid off, who does not pick it up on the first attempt and they safely complete the single
Balaji to Mishra,1 run,whipped with the angle from off to deep midwicket
Balaji to Steyn, $$OUT$$ ,Balaji has his fourth, offcutter angled in, Steyn swings and misses, and Balaji hits middle
Balaji to Kumar,no run,slower one cuts in from wide outside off, he underedges it on the bounce to the keeper
Balaji to Kumar,1 run,turned in front of square leg off the pad, they settle for one in the end
Balaji to Mishra,1 run,pitched up ball hit down to long on
Balaji gets friendly pats from his captain first and then his team-mates
Dhawan to Mishra,1 run,squeezes a length ball to point off the back foot
Dhawan to Kumar, $$OUT$$ ,that'll be it, full and slow delivery mishit over midwicket, Johnson runs across from long on and takes a tumbling catch
That is all for tonight. Good bye

Man of the Match is Maxwell. "Wicket was a little different tonight. I was a bit lucky. Just try and flow, just try and keep certain areas to hit, have got a simple gameplan, am trying to target certain bowlers It will be nice to get there [to a hundred]. At least this time I did not get out when we were chasing. Want to score for the team."

Bailey: "Nice to see us put a good total on the board and to have a good start from Viru and Puj. Wicket was a little hard to score on but you would not know that from the way Maxwell was batting. We know it is not going to happen every time There will be times when the other guys will have to step up. Bala's comeback tonight was outstanding. Worked hard at training. Really pleased with our bowling, not so with our fielding, but it is ok."
Plenty of one-sided games so far this season. Sunrisers prevented Kings XI from chasing by winning the toss, but that was about it as Maxwell and co ran up another 190-plus score

Dhawan: "We dropped lots of catches, and Maxwell went on to score big. Target went very high. Lost lots of wickets, it was a big batting failure. when you drop catches and all this stuff... of course, batsmen have bit of pressure. We need to work on our batting group and score more runs."
Balaji: "It was little slow, try to work on little bit variations. In this game you have to adapt quickly, understand the wicket."

name: Kings XI Punjab v Sunrisers Hyderabad
